statements: SELECT * FROM FundraisingEvents WHERE event_name = 'Gala Event';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM FundraisingEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, attendance_count FROM FundraisingEvents WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT event_name, ticket_sales, revenue FROM FundraisingEvents ORDER BY ticket_sales DESC;
SELECT AVG(attendance_count) AS avg_attendance FROM FundraisingEvents;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM FundraisingEvents WHERE attendance_count > 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC, event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM FundraisingEvents WHERE revenue > 5000 AND ticket_sales < 2000;
SELECT event_name, revenue * 0.1 AS donation_amount FROM FundraisingEvents WHERE revenue > 10000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, IF(attendance_count > 200, 'High', 'Low') AS attendance_level FROM FundraisingEvents;
SELECT event_name, ticket_sales, revenue FROM FundraisingEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC, ticket_sales ASC;
SELECT * FROM event_attendance;
SELECT attendee_id, event_date FROM event_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT event_id, attendance_status FROM event_attendance ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(ticket_price) AS highest_price FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT event_id, SUM(ticket_quantity) AS total_tickets_sold FROM ticket_sales GROUP BY event_id;

SELECT * FROM event_attendance
WHERE event_id = 123
ORDER BY event_date DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT attendee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM event_attendance
GROUP BY attendee_id
HAVING total_attendance > 1

SELECT event_id, AVG(ticket_price) AS avg_ticket_price FROM ticket_sales
GROUP BY event_id
ORDER BY avg_ticket_price DESC

SELECT event_id, SUM(ticket_quantity) AS total_tickets_sold FROM ticket_sales
GROUP BY event_id
HAVING total_tickets_sold > 50

SELECT * FROM event_attendance
INNER JOIN ticket_sales ON event_attendance.event_id = ticket_sales.event_id
WHERE attendance_status = 'checked-in' AND event_date > '2022-01-01'
ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT * FROM EventAttendance;
SELECT attendee_name, event_id FROM EventAttendance ORDER BY event_id DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, attendance_status FROM EventAttendance WHERE attendance_status='Present';
SELECT event_id, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM RevenueTracking GROUP BY event_id;
SELECT event_id, ticket_price, sold_quantity FROM TicketSales WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM EventAttendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT attendee_name, attendance_status FROM EventAttendance WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TicketSales WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY sold_quantity DESC;
SELECT event_id, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM RevenueTracking GROUP BY event_id HAVING total_revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM EventAttendance INNER JOIN TicketSales ON EventAttendance.event_id = TicketSales.event_id;
SELECT * FROM EventAttendance;
SELECT event_id, attendance_date FROM EventAttendance WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT event_name FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM Revenue GROUP BY event_id;
SELECT * FROM TicketSales ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM EventAttendance WHERE attendee_id = 123;
SELECT event_id, attendance_date FROM EventAttendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TicketSales WHERE ticket_price > 50.00 AND tickets_sold >= 100;
SELECT event_name, revenue_amount FROM Events JOIN Revenue ON Events.event_id = Revenue.event_id WHERE revenue_amount > 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM Event_Attendance;
SELECT attendee_name, check_in_time FROM Event_Attendance ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue_name FROM Event_Details WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, revenue_amount FROM Revenue WHERE transaction_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_id, planning_notes FROM Event_Planning WHERE plan_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Event_Attendance ORDER BY attendee_name DESC, event_id ASC;
SELECT attendee_name, check_in_time FROM Event_Attendance WHERE event_id = 101 ORDER BY check_in_time DESC;
SELECT event_name, venue_name FROM Event_Details WHERE event_date >= '2022-05-01' AND event_date <= '2022-06-30';

SELECT attendee_name, check_in_time, venue_name FROM Event_Attendance INNER JOIN Event_Details ON Event_Attendance.event_id = Event_Details.event_id WHERE Event_Attendance.check_in_time >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY Event_Attendance.check_in_time ASC;
SELECT revenue_amount, transaction_date FROM Revenue WHERE revenue_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC, revenue_amount DESC;
